document_data.name: Justyn Rassk
document_data.mainbody: '''Justyn Rassk''' was a butcher and representative of the [[Guilds of Waterdeep|Guild of Butchers]] in [[Waterdeep]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.History:
Justyn grew up in the toughest neighborhood in the [[Field Ward of Waterdeep]], gaining many scars.

In [[1492 DR]],{{WDH-time}} Justyn possibly went into business with the new owners of the [[Trollskull Manor]].
document_data.Personality: Justyn disliked going to the [[North Ward of Waterdeep|North Ward]] and in that part of the city his heart was always full of resentment. He always tried to ask extra pay for delivering the guild's meats.
